```{r}
#### code to make a basic overall plot
# load libraries
library(data.table)
# some helper functions
library(kleptomoveR)
```

```{r}
# read parameter combinations
data = fread("data/results/data_param_combinations.csv")

# no random
data = data[sim_type != "random", ]
```

```{r}
# get strategy, fitness and conflicts over gens
data[, summary_data := lapply(folder_path,
                              get_strategy_gen)]
```

```{r}
# unlist
data = data[, unlist(summary_data, recursive = F),
            by = c("sim_type", "replicate", "regrowth")]
```

```{r}
# save data
fwrite(data, file = "data/results/data_strategy_gen.csv")
```
